p: For analyses of phenylpropanoid glycosides, 0.30 g of lyophilized biomass/dried herb was extracted five times with 3 mL portions of methanol in an ultrasonic bath for 30 min and the extracts were centrifuged and after filtration through a syringe filter (Millex ®GP, Millipore, 0.22 μm, Filter Unit) analyzed using HPLC-DAD method.
